sizeAdvice: The size grid is universal. If you know your exact dimensions, send them with the order: we will pick the sizes for you individually.
deliveryDetails: After paying for the order, we will send a confirmation by email. Delivery is carried out by courier service. The delivery time in the CIS countries is 3-7 days. The delivery time around the world depends on the work of customs (2 weeks on average).
returnPolicy: If the dress doesn't fit or you just don't like it, you can return it. Send an exchange or refund request to shop@plumplum.co within 24 hours of receiving the order.
careInstructions: Handwash it in lukewarm water with a mild detergent, avoiding harsh chemicals or bleach. Air dry the dress away from direct sunlight. For stubborn stains or thorough cleaning, consider professional dry cleaning.
